column1: '''Lord of the Piercing''' is a short 4 minute parody of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'', created for the [[wikipedia:2002 MTV Movie Awards
column2: 2002 MTV Movie Awards]]. It was broadcast [[6 June
column3: June 6]], [[2002]]. ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' won two awards (Best Movie and [[Orlando Bloom
column4: Best Newcomer]]) out of five nominations.

column1: The parody was also included as an easter egg on [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)
column2: the Extended Edition]] of ''The Fellowship of the Ring''.

column1: The segment features Jack Black and Sarah Michelle Gellar at the [[Council of Elrond]]. Jack the Elf accidently pierced [[the One Ring]] onto an appendage of his.
Footage of ''[[The Council of Elrond (scene)]]'' is being reused.
* [http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0331560/ Lord of the Piercing]  at [http://www.imdb.com/ IMDb]
